PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-11172017-08-31,  ,  ,  ISED, 
ActInvestment Canada Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Investment Canada Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INVESTMENT CANADA REGULATIONS so that Non-Canadians to which the $1.5 billion in enterprise value net benefit review threshold applies are able to calculate the value of the Canadian business being acquired in order to meet Canada's commitments in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0168 Publication Date: 2017-09-20
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Investment Canada Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the INVESTMENT CANADA REGULATIONS so that Non-Canadians to which the $1.5 billion in enterprise value net  benefit review threshold applies are able to calculate the value of the Canadian business being acquired in order to meet Canada's commitments in the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.
